resources.string: Both Standard ODB and Danlaw\'s Custom PIDs can be requested through basic data channel.\nPIDs requested through this channel do not receive continuous updates.
Only Standard ODB data PIDs (id: 0\-255) can be registered for continuous updates. \nRegistered PIDs continue to receive updates in realtime until they are unregistered.
Realtime events once registered, continue to receive updates in realtime until they are unregistered.

If Auto Connect is turned on app will set the connected device as favorite and then the app will try to connect to the device automatically during any foreground or background (triggered by location change) scans.
UDP Events are only delivered by BLEAP devices.\nNo registration is required to receive the data.
